sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of Wal-Mart Stores ( WMT ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.5%.
Year to date, Wal-Mart Stores registers a 19.9% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is DuPont ( DD ), trading down 1.6%.
DuPont is lower by about 7.0% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Verizon Communications ( VZ ), trading down 1.6%, and Home Depot ( HD ), trading up 0.4% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
